description:
This course covers the basics of designing a game user interface or concept inside Photoshop . It details the tools used and also the use of layer styles to create your concept/design .

This course will help you learn the uses of certain Photoshop tools , shortcuts and layer styles at a beginner level and hopefully help you to advance your skills within this area and grow your understanding of a very powerful peice of software with a variety of uses.

This course includes the design psd as well as free resources and textures that were used in the creation of the design .
title: MOBA Game UI design
